Actions.Name: Pop Bubble
Actions.Description: This [name]'s bubbles bulge, giving it the following interrupt until the start of its next turn:

Interrupts.Name: Warping Bubble
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in range 2 is targeted by an ability, and that ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: That ally gains 2 vigor after that ability resolves each time they were damaged by that ability.

Actions.Name: Skinwarp
Actions.Description: Remove any ally from the battlefield, then place them anywhere else on the battlefield. If bloodied, they are also cured.
